meanings.definition: To make (something) known to the public.
meanings.sent1: The company is publicizing their new product through social media.
meanings.sent2: She is publicizing the event by putting up posters around town.
meanings.sent3: Publicizing the bake sale brought in more customers than expected.
meanings.sent4: His speech publicizing the importance of recycling resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The bright billboard publicizing the concert caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The action of making (something) known to the public.
meanings.sent1: The publicizing of the charity event was a success.
meanings.sent2: Effective publicizing can increase attendance at community events.
meanings.sent3: The publicizing of the magician's show drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent4: The publicizing of the new movie created a buzz among moviegoers.
meanings.sent5: Good publicizing can help businesses reach a wider audience.
